Content: Hey guys! Is there any way to go back to the old Minecraft textures on the Nintendo Switch edition? I prefer the old ones and it seems there's no way to go back.
That's kinda dumb. I think there should just be a toggle switch under video or resource packs to use old textures
Oh all newer consoles work on bedrock
Off-topic but why the HECK can't we pause in single player in bedrock edition?
There's a thread in the official feedback column about pausing and they said they'd fix it 6 months ago but it hasn't happened yet. Seems to me like a no-brainer to put pausing in single player.
Hmm... <@339883917530365953> are you trying to play LAN or online?
If it's online you'll need to make sure you've both got a subscription to the Nintendo Switch Online service.
Are you both friends on the switch friend thing?
Hmm well then I'm not sure.
Anyone else know the answer to <@339883917530365953> 's question?
Oops I'm kind of a slow typer

Ok what the HECK happened to the textures? I hate the new stone texture_ and the ingots and diamonds and stuff looks terrible. Any way to go back to the old ones? I'm on the Nintendo Switch_ or bedrock edition.
I just don't like it. I like the old textures better
